## Ingredients 

::: columns
::: {.column width="48%"}

* two slices of bread

* pesto

:::

::: {.column width="2%"}
:::

::: {.column width="48%"}

* hard boilded egg (or tinned fish)

* sun dried tomatoes and oil

:::
:::

## Directions

1. Toast the bread and add a layer of pesto.

2. Cut up a hard boiled egg and place on top of pesto with sun dried tomatoes and oil.
